thread.title: One Direction's Liam Payne apologises after illness cancels show and announces rescheduled date
thread.title_full: One Direction's Liam Payne apologises after illness cancels show and announces rescheduled date

title: One Direction's Liam Payne apologises after illness cancels show and announces rescheduled date
text: PUBLISHED: October 21, 2015 9:12 am LAST UPDATED: October 21, 2015 1:34 pm One Direction's Liam Payne apologises after illness cancels show and announces rescheduled date One Direction's Liam Payne has apologised to fans after he fell ill, resulting in the cancellation of the group's concert in Belfast, and spoke of his excitement ahead of the rescheduled show. Liam Payne has announced the Belfast show will be rescheduled
